structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 6, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 85, sec. 276, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 104, secs. 4 and 6, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 2, effective April 8, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000; ch. 281, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 357, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 209, sec. 16, effective March 30, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 183, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 329, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 400, sec. 4, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 39, effective January 1, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4149b-8.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Interest on certificates of delinquency -- Collection of amount due on certificate of delinquency and delinquent personal property tax bills -- Technical resources from department -- Installment payments.
